wikipedia_page.main: Frederick Marrant Robertson (1843 – 28 March 1920) was an English first-class cricketer active 1871–80 who played for Surrey. He was born in Cape Town; died in Kensington.

response: * Frederick Robertson (politician) (1909–2002), member of the Canadian House of Commons
